overview: Muhammad has been partially involved in a separate effort in activities, projects, and initiatives related to philanthropy & volunteerism, social & public awareness, entrepreneurship, Start-up Business, franchise business, tourism & hospitality, Retail industry, social media, IT, FOSS, telemarketing, real estate & properties development, PR, Human Capital Investment, and Green Movement & Sustainability as whole.
